00173     public static class ButtonListener5 implements FieldChangeListener {
00174         Citation c;
00175         CitationScreen5 cs5;
00176                     
00177         public ButtonListener5(CitationScreen5 _cs5, Citation _c){
00178             cs5 = _cs5;
00179             c = _c;
00180         }
00181                     
00182         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00183             ButtonField btn = (ButtonField) field;
00184             if(btn.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00185                 cs5.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00186                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen6(c));
00187             }
00188             else if(btn.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00189                 cs5.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00190                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs5);
00191             }   
00192         }
00193     } 
00194     
00195     static final class CourtButtonListener5 implements FieldChangeListener {
00196         private CitationScreen5 cs5 = null;
00197         
00198         public CourtButtonListener5(CitationScreen5 _cs5){
00199                 cs5 = _cs5;
00200         }
00201         
00202         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00203                 ButtonField btn = (ButtonField)field;
00204                 if (btn != null) {
00205                                 Status.show("Retrieving Court Date...");
00206                         QueryMgr query = ((CitationApp)UiApplication.getUiApplication()).getQueryMgr();
00207                         CViolation cv = (CViolation)query.getCourtInfo();
00208                         
00209                         if (cv != null) {
00210                         String temp_date = cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_DATE);
00211                         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00212                         int startGMT = temp_date.indexOf("GMT ");
00213                         int endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00214                         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00215                         {
00216                                 temp_date = temp_date.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_date.substring(endGMT);
00217                         }
00218                         long td = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_date);
00219                         cs5.field_crt_dte.setDate(td);
00220                         
00221                         String temp_time = cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_TIME);
00222                         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00223                         startGMT = temp_time.indexOf("GMT ");
00224                         endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00225                         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00226                         {   // strip 'GMT ' out of the time string
00227                                 temp_time = temp_time.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_time.substring(endGMT);
00228                         }
00229                         long tt = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_time);
00230                         cs5.field_crt_tme.setDate(tt);
00231 
00232                         cs5.field_crt_name.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_NAME));
00233                         cs5.field_crt_address.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_ADDRESS));
00234                         cs5.field_crt_city.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_CITY));
00235                         cs5.field_crt_state.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_STATE));
00236                         cs5.field_crt_zip.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_ZIP));
00237                         cs5.field_crt_phone.setText(cv.getElement(CViolation.COURT_PHONE));                            }
00238                         else {
00239                             StringBuffer msg = new StringBuffer("Unable to retrieve Court Date. \n\n");
00240                             msg.append(query.getLastError());
00241                             Dialog.inform(msg.toString());
00242                         }
00243                 }
00244         }
00245     }

00250     private MenuItem saveItem5 = new MenuItem("Save", 110, 10) {
00251         public void run() {
00252                 
00253                storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00254             CitationStore.Save();
00255         }
00256     };

00258     private MenuItem getItem5 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00259         public void run() {
00260               
00261                CitationStore.Restore();
00262                restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();   
00263         }
00264     };

00270     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00271     {
00272         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_NAME, field_crt_name.getText());
00273         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_ADDRESS, field_crt_address.getText());
00274         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_CITY, field_crt_city.getText());
00275         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_STATE, field_crt_state.getText());
00276         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_ZIP, field_crt_zip.getText());
00277         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_PHONE, field_crt_phone.getText());
00278   
00279         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_DATE, field_crt_dte.toString());
00280         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.COURT_TIME, field_crt_tme.toString());
00281     }
00282     
00287     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00288     {
00289  
00290         String temp_date = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.DATE);
00291         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00292         int startGMT = temp_date.indexOf("GMT ");
00293         int endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00294         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00295         {
00296                 temp_date = temp_date.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_date.substring(endGMT);
00297         }
00298         long td = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_date);
00299         field_crt_dte.setDate(td);
00300         
00301         String temp_time = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.TIME);
00302         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00303         startGMT = temp_time.indexOf("GMT ");
00304         endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00305         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00306         {   // strip 'GMT ' out of the time string
00307                 temp_time = temp_time.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_time.substring(endGMT);
00308         }
00309         long tt = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_time);
00310         field_crt_tme.setDate(tt);
00311 
00312         field_crt_name.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_NAME));
00313         field_crt_address.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_ADDRESS));
00314         field_crt_city.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_CITY));
00315         field_crt_state.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_STATE));
00316         field_crt_zip.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_ZIP));
00317         field_crt_phone.setText(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.COURT_PHONE));                  
00318     }
